caption: Pretty satisfactory quality. Delicious, properly marinated. Would like to visit again.

I have yet to find a place better than this. The spicy ahi and Hawaiian poke combo bowl is my absolute favorite. I always intend on trying something new but as soon as I get here, I beeline for the same bowl every time. Not a single place has come close to this fresh poke.

Hands down the best poke on island. I go here multiple times a week and have always had quality poke and good service. My favorite is the spicy ahi poke bowl. Give it a try, you won’t be disappointed :)

Disappointing. Gave this place a try in the afternoon. Ordered a pound of salmon poke, rice and seaweed salad. For some reason they thought serving poke and seaweed salad that was still FROZEN was appropriate. :(
